Description.Text:
Position The Hotel Curtatone has been specially designed to make your stay unforgettable. In our structure you'll be able to find an extremely friendly and relaxing atmosphere with an impeccable service, all at the lowest prices in Florence. Hotel Curtatone is in a very favorable position if you are in Florence for business or simply for pleasure. Located near the center, the Hotel Curtatone is next to Santa Maria Novella Station - just a two-minutes walk - and all the most important monuments of Florence.
Restaurant Buffet breakfast.

More Informations The hotel has: Air conditioning and heating throughout the hotel, Luggage room, Tourist information (free), City Map (free), Multilingual staff, front desk 24/7, Fax and prints (payment required), Laundry service (payment required), Internet corner (payment required), TV Room, Bar, safe at front desk. Small pets are welcomed in the structure.
